title: Virgin Islands National Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       Visitor Center Located in Cruz Bay has wheelchair-accessible entrance, parking, and restrooms.    Beaches   Trunk Beach Wheelchair-accessible parking, restrooms, changing rooms, beach wheelchairs, and an accessible path to water.   *When we have had north swells, the entrances to the beach can get washed out.    Hawksnest Beach Wheelchair-accessible parking, restrooms, changing rooms, and an accessible path to water.   * When we have had north swells, the entrances to the beach can get washed out.   Trails & Paths   Cinnamon Bay Self-Guided Trail  Offers boardwalk access which meanders through the historic ruins. This boardwalk trail entrance is located across from the exit gate of the Cinnamon Bay Campground.   Francis Bay Board Walk Offers accessible access to a beautiful salt pond, perfect for bird viewing.
